title: Pretend Hero
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Maki-chan~! Maki-chan, Maki-chan! Over here--!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You don’t have to shout that loud, okay? I’m going<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hey, hey, Rin is going to slide down headfirst from the slide now, watch Rin<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eeh!? Stop doing dangerous things!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It’s fine, it’s fine! Here goes~, go---!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wa-....! ….Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh? Heeh~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You’re going down pretty slowly<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>That’s weird. Rin was supposed to go swoosh like a superhero…. Rin will try again nya-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Yeah, yeah, I’ll watch so, go ahead and do it as many times as you want<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
